description:
'You had me jumping' through hoops to get you here!' director Kaden says to our latest recruit, Morgan, who is debuting in front of the camera tonight.

Well, I think the hoops were well worth jumping through, as Morgan's an impressive fella and this is his 'first time doing this shit, so here goes!' he says, with a laugh.

Morgan is 23-years old, hails from Texas and stands about 5'9' tall. He weighs 175 lbs., has rippling abs, and says he tries to 'stay out of trouble.' He talks specifically about how much he loves his dog -- and how the dog seemingly gnaws on everything in his house, too.

(Bonus: Morgan says he's 'rock hard most of the time.' Oh, really?)

With regards to shooting some porn, Morgan says that it 'seemed like the right time in my life to do it… why not?' and continues to say that he's 'more comfortable' than he thought he'd be. Well, if I do say so, we've rolled out the welcome wagon quite nicely for Morgan!

'I'm glad you're having a good experience so far,' Kaden says. And then Morgan quickly jokes, 'So far…' lol.

Morgan has a pretty amazing story about when he was an 18 and unwittingly showed up to a three-way … that turned into a four-way! It's a doozy of a story, so buckle up, folks!

You're gonna enjoy Morgan today, I think -- he's got a fat dick, a strong chest and muscular legs -- and he dirty talks to the camera, too!
title: Morgan
